user_query: I want to surprise my friends with a sustainable picnic in the park. Can you recommend some eco-friendly picnic spots in the city? Also, provide me with the carbon footprint of different types of motorbikes for short-distance travel.

TaskList.description: Gather a list of eco-friendly picnic spots available in the city, focusing on sustainability and environmental friendliness.
Compile information regarding the carbon footprint associated with different types of motorbikes suitable for short-distance travel.
Combine the recommendations from the eco-friendly picnic spots and the carbon footprint data to suggest optimal transportation methods and locations for the picnic.
